Mike Pence said he made the final decision not to run for president Wednesday night. He and his wife told their two daughters and then called their son, who is in college, early Thursday. We just concluded that while we could seek the presidency, we concluded that our best opportunity to continue to serve the people of Indiana was either in Washington, D.C., or here at home, Mike Pence said.
